original_title: Hot Body Competition: Naughty Nurses Contest
overview: In these days of spiraling medical costs, questionable HMO practices and no cure yet for the common cold, Hot Body has decided to shed some positive light on the health care profession by presenting the Naughty Nurses Contest. 9 gorgeous candy strippers... I mean stripers, don't let their lack of medical degrees stop them from showing you their best bedside manner during the competition as well as exciting private dances. If Mary Jane, Shyla Stylez, Little Lexy, Diane Kellar, Erica Campbell, Jana Cova, Angel Cassidy, Nissa and Courtney Taylor don't raise your blood pressure, you might want to actually schedule an appointment to see your doctor. We'll take you behind the scenes into the nurses lounge for some pulse pounding, very revealing peeks as the girls get ready for their shift. You won't see anything like this on ER. So enjoy your stay at Hot Body Memorial Hospital where the operative phrase is, "Nurse, more suction".
title: Hot Body Competition: Naughty Nurses Contest
